DataPoint.name: operationStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.

DataPoint.name: installationLocation
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the installation location

DataPoint.name: standardVersionInformation
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the release number of the corresponding Appendix.

DataPoint.name: identificationNumber
DataPoint.Doc: A number that allows each object to be uniquely identified.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousPowerConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the instantaneous power consumption of the device in watts.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativePowerConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative power consumption of the device in increments of 0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: manufacturer'sFaultCode
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the manufacturer-defined fault code.

DataPoint.name: currentLimitSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the current limit setting (0-100%).

DataPoint.name: faultStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether a fault (e.g. a sensor trouble) has occurred or not.

DataPoint.name: faultDescription
DataPoint.Doc: Describes the fault.

DataPoint.name: manufacturerCode
DataPoint.Doc: 3-byte manufacturer code

DataPoint.name: businessFacilityCode
DataPoint.Doc: 3-byte business facility code

DataPoint.name: productCode
DataPoint.Doc: Identifies the product using ASCII code.

DataPoint.name: productionNumber
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the production number using ASCII code.

DataPoint.name: productionDate
DataPoint.Doc: 4-byte production date code

DataPoint.name: powerSavingOperationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the device is operating in power-saving mode.

DataPoint.name: remoteControlSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether remote control is through a public network or not.

DataPoint.name: currentTimeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Current time (HH: MM format)

DataPoint.name: currentDateSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Current date (YYYY: MM: DD format)

DataPoint.name: powerLimitSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the power limit setting in watts.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeOperatingTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative number of days, hours, minutes or seconds for which the device has operated, using 1 byte for the unit and 4 bytes for the time.

DataPoint.name: statusChangeAnnouncementPropertyMap
DataPoint.Doc: See Annex 1.

DataPoint.name: setPropertyMap
DataPoint.Doc: See Annex 1.

DataPoint.name: getPropertyMap
DataPoint.Doc: See Annex 1.

DataPoint.name: measuredTemperatureValue
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured temperature value in units of 0.1°C.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amounts of electric energy in 0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: mediumCapacitySensorInstantaneousElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measured instantaneous electric energy in watts.

DataPoint.name: smallCapacitySensorInstantaneousElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates instantaneous electric energy in units of 0.1 W.

DataPoint.name: largeCapacitySensorInstantaneousElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates instantaneous electric energy in units of 0.1 kW.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasurementLog
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measurement result log of cumulative amounts of electric energy (0.001kWh) for the past 24 hours in 30-minute sections.

DataPoint.name: effectiveVoltageValue
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates effective voltage value in volts.

DataPoint.name: measuredCurrentValue1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measured current value in mA.

DataPoint.name: ratedVoltageToBeMeasured
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measured current value in mA.

DataPoint.name: measuredCurrentValue2
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measured current value in mA.

DataPoint.name: degreeOfOpeningDetectionStatus1
DataPoint.Doc: Specifies open/close detection status and one of 8 different degrees of opening.

DataPoint.name: detectionThresholdLevel
DataPoint.Doc: Specifies detection threshold level (8-step).

DataPoint.name: degreeOfOpeningDetectionStatus2
DataPoint.Doc: Specifies whether degree-of-opening detected or not

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasurementValue
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amounts of electric energy in decimal (8 digits).

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyUnit
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates number of decimal places of cumulative amounts of electric energy (0xE0).

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasurementLog1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amounts of electric energy (8 digits) measurement result log in 30-minute segments for past 24 hours.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfElectricEnergy(normalDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfElectricEnergy(reverseDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

DataPoint.name: unitForCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) used for the measured cumulative amount of electric energy and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy(normalDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (8 digits), which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy(reverseDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (8 digits), which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

DataPoint.name: dayForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyIsToBeRetrieved
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours) is to be retrieved.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousAmountOfElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous amount of electric energy in watts.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCurrents(RPhase)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous R phase currents in amperes.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCurrents(TPhase)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous T phase currents in amperes. In the case of a single-phase, two-wire system, 0x7FFE shall be used for the T phase.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousVoltages(betweenRAndS(N))
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous R-S(N) voltages in volts.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousVoltages(betweenS(N)AndT)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous S(N)-T voltages in volts. In the case of a single-phase, two-wire system, 0xFFFE shall be used for the S(N)-T voltage.

DataPoint.name: numberOfMeasurementChannels(simplex)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of simplex measurement channels.

DataPoint.name: channelRangeSpecificationForCumulativeAmountOfElectricPowerConsumptionMeasurement(simplex)
DataPoint.Doc: This property is used to specify the range of acquisition by the measured cumulative amount of electric power consumption list (simplex).

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfElectricPowerConsumptionList(simplex)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of electric power consumption of a measurement channel specified by the property of "Channel range specification for cumulative amount of electric power consumption measurement (simplex)."

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevel
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates illuminance level in %.

DataPoint.name: lightColorSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the color setting.

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelStepSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the illuminance level in terms of steps and acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: lightColorStepSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the light color in terms of steps and acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: maximumSpecifiableValuesIlluminance
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the maximum specifiable illuminance level value of main lighting.

DataPoint.name: maximumSpecifiableValuesLlightColor
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the maximum specifiable light color value of main lighting.

DataPoint.name: maximumValueOfSettableLevelForNightLightingIlluminance
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the maximum values of illuminance settable levels for night lighting.

DataPoint.name: maximumValueOfSettableLevelForNightLightingColor
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the maximum values of light color settable levels for night lighting.

DataPoint.name: lightingModeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Auto/main lighting/night lighting/color lighting

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelSettingForMainLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Indicates the illuminance level of main lighting in %.

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelStepSettingForMainLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the illuminance level by the number of steps for main lighting and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelSettingForNightLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Indicates the illuminance level of night lighting in %.

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelStepSettingForNightLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the illuminance level by the number of steps for night lighting and to acquire the current setting status.

DataPoint.name: lightColorSettingForMainLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the light color for main lighting.

DataPoint.name: lightColorLevelStepSettingForMainLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the light color level by the number of steps for main lighting and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: lightColorSettingForNightLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the light color for night lighting.

DataPoint.name: lightColorLevelStepSettingForNightLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the light color level by the number of steps for night lighting and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: lightingModeStatusInAutoMode
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the current lighting mode in auto mode.

DataPoint.name: rgbSettingForColorLighting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the RGB value for color lighting and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: onTimerReservationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Reservation ON/OFF

DataPoint.name: onTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value HH:MM

DataPoint.name: offTimerReservationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Reservation ON/OFF

DataPoint.name: offTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value HH:MM

DataPoint.name: illuminanceLevelSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates illuminance level in %.

DataPoint.name: door/CoverOpen/CloseStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the door/cover is open or closed.

DataPoint.name: washingMachineSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Washing machine setting

DataPoint.name: currentStageOfWashingCycle
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the current stage of the washing cycle.

DataPoint.name: timeRemainingToCompleteWashingCycle
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the time remaining to complete the current washing cycle in the HH:MM:SS format.

DataPoint.name: onTimerReservationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Reservation ON/OFF

DataPoint.name: onTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value (HH:MM)

DataPoint.name: relativeTimeBasedOnTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value (HH:MM)

DataPoint.name: door/CoverOpen/CloseStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the status of the door or cover as to whether it is open or closed.

DataPoint.name: dryingSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Drying setting

DataPoint.name: dryingStatus
DataPoint.Doc: Drying status

DataPoint.name: remainingDryingTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining drying time in the "HH:MM:SS" format.

DataPoint.name: onTimerReservationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Reservation ON/OFF

DataPoint.name: onTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value HH:MM

DataPoint.name: relativeTimeBasedOnTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Timer value HH:MM

DataPoint.name: door/CoverOpen/CloseStatus
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the status of the door/cover (i.e. open or closed).

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether to start or stop the washing, drying or washing and drying cycle, and to acquire the current status.

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycleSetting1
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the washer and dryer cycle option(s) to use in the "washing and drying," "washing" or "drying" mode and to acquire the current setting(s). The value ranges shall be as follows: Washing and drying course: 0x21-0x3F Washing and drying course maker original code: 0x40-0x4F Washing course: 0x61-0x7F Washing course maker original code: 0x80-0x8F Drying course: 0xA1-0xBF Drying course maker original code: 0xC0-0xDF

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycleSetting2
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the washer and dryer cycle option(s) to use in the "washing and drying" mode, and to acquire the current setting(s). The drying option(s) to use shall be specified with the "drying cycle setting" property (EPC = 0xD2).Maker original code = 0xE0-0xEF

DataPoint.name: dryingCycleSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the drying cycle option(s) to use, and to acquire the current setting. For the "washing and drying" mode, the "washer and dryer cycle setting 2" property (EPC = 0xD1) shall be used.Maker original code = 0xE0 to 0xEF

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycleOptionList1
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire a bitmap list of the washer and dryer cycle options that can be specified with the "washer and dryer cycle setting 1" property.

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycleOptionList2
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire a bitmap list of the washer and dryer cycle options that can be specified with the "washer and dryer cycle setting 2" property.

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycleOptionList3
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire a bitmap list of the drying cycle options that can be specified with the "drying cycle setting" property.

DataPoint.name: waterFlowRateSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the water flow rate by selecting a level from among the predefined levels and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: rotationSpeedForSpinDryingSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the rotation speed for spin drying in r/min. and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: degreeOfDryingSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the degree of drying to achieve by selecting a level from among the 16 predefined levels and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: remainingWashingTime
DataPoint.Doc: Acquires the remaining washing time in the "HH:MM" format.

DataPoint.name: remainingDryingTime
DataPoint.Doc: Acquires the remaining drying time in the "HH:MM" format.

DataPoint.name: elapsedTimeOnTheOnTimer
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the time elapsed on the ON timer after the ON timer was activated.

DataPoint.name: presoakingTimeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the duration of the presoaking process and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: currentStageOfWasherAndDryerCycle
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the current stage of the washer and dryer cycle.

DataPoint.name: waterVolumeSetting1
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the water volume in liters and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: waterVolumeSetting2
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the water volume by selecting a level from among the predefined levels and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: washingTimeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the duration of the washing process and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: numberOfTimesOfRinsingSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the number of times of rinsing and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: rinsingProcessSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the rinsing process(es) to use by means of a bitmap, and to acquire the current setting. Four bits are used to represent each rinsing process as follows: Bits 0 through bit 3: 1st rinsing Bits 4 through bit 7: 2nd rinsing Bits 8 through bit 11: 3rd rinsing Bits 12 through bit 15: 4th rinsing Bits 16 through bit 19: 5th rinsing Bits 20 through bit 23: 6th rinsing Bits 24 through bit 27: 7th rinsing Bits 28 through bit 31: 8th rinsing

DataPoint.name: spinDryingTimeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the duration of the spin drying process in minutes and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: dryingTimeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the duration of the drying process and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: warmWaterSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the temperature of laundry water in °C and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: bathtubWaterRecycleSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not, and when, to recycle used bathtub water, and acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: wrinklingMinimizationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the wrinkling minimization function, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: timeRemainingToCompleteWasherAndDryerCycle
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the time remaining to complete the current washer and dryer cycle in the "HH: MM" format.

DataPoint.name: door/CoverLockSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the state of the door/cover lock during operation and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: washerAndDryerCycle
DataPoint.Doc: Used to acquire the current washer and dryer cycle setting.

DataPoint.name: onTimerReservationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the ON timer-based reservation function, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: onTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the time for the time-based reservation function of the ON timer and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: relativeTimeBasedOnTimerSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the relative time for the relative time-based reservation function of the ON timer and to acquire the time remaining for the current reservation.

DataPoint.name: connectedDevice
DataPoint.Doc: Name of the device to connect to

DataPoint.name: operationPowerSaving
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the power-saving operation mode and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: operationModeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the operation mode (“automatic,” “cooling,” “heating,” “dehumidification,” “air circulator” or “other”), and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: automaticTemperatureControlSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic temperature control function, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: normal/HighSpeed/SilentOperationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the type of operation (“normal,” “high-speed” or “silent”), and to acquire the current setting

DataPoint.name: setTemperatureValue
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the temperature and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: setValueOfRelativeHumidityInDehumidifyingMode

DataPoint.name: setTemperatureValueInCoolingMode
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the temperature for the “cooling” mode and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: setTemperatureValueInHeatingMode
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the temperature for the “heating” mode and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: setTemperatureValueInDehumidifyingMode
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the temperature for the “dehumidification” mode and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: ratedPowerConsumption(cooling)
DataPoint.Doc: Rated power consumption in operation mode of cooling

DataPoint.name: ratedPowerConsumption(heating)
DataPoint.Doc: Rated power consumption in operation mode of heating

DataPoint.name: ratedPowerConsumption(dehumidifying)
DataPoint.Doc: Rated power consumption in operation mode of dehumidifying

DataPoint.name: ratedPowerConsumption(blast)
DataPoint.Doc: Rated power consumption in operation mode of blast

DataPoint.name: measuredValueOfCurrentConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: Measured value of current consumption

DataPoint.name: measuredValueOfRoomRelativeHumidity
DataPoint.Doc: Measured value of room relative humidity

DataPoint.name: measuredValueOfRoomTemperature
DataPoint.Doc: Measured value of room temperature

DataPoint.name: setTemperatureValueOfUserRemoteControl
DataPoint.Doc: Set temperature value of user remote control

DataPoint.name: measuredCooledAirTemperature
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cooled air temperature at the outlet.

DataPoint.name: measuredOutdoorAirTemperature
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured outdoor air temperature.

DataPoint.name: relativeTemperatureSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to set the relative temperature relative to the target temperature for an air conditioner operation mode, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: airFlowRateSetting
DataPoint.Doc: 0xA0 Used to specify the air flow rate or use the function to automatically control the air flow rate, and to acquire the current setting. The air flow rate shall be selected from among the 8 predefined levels.

DataPoint.name: automaticControlOfAirFlowDirectionSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow direction control function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow direction control function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: automaticSwingOfAirFlowSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the automatic air flow swing function, to specify the plane(s) (vertical and/or horizontal) in which the automatic air flow swing function is to be used, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: airFlowDirection(vertical)Setting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the air flow direction in the vertical plane by selecting a pattern from among the 5 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: airFlowDirection(horizontal)Setting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the air flow direction(s) in the horizontal plane by selecting a pattern from among the 31 predefined patterns, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: specialState
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates if the air conditioner is in a “special” state (i.e. the “defrosting,” “preheating,” or “heat removal” state).

DataPoint.name: nonPriorityState
DataPoint.Doc: Used to indicate when the air conditioner is in a “non-priority” state.

DataPoint.name: ventilationFunctionSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the ventilation function, to specify the ventilation direction, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: humidifierFunctionSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify whether or not to use the humidifier function, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: ventilationAirFlowRateSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the ventilation air flow rate by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: degreeOfHumidificationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the degree of humidification to achieve by selecting a level from among the predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: mountedAirCleaningMethod(electricalDustCollectionMethod)
DataPoint.Doc: A bitmap indicates mounted electrical dust collection method of exercising air cleaning function.

DataPoint.name: mountedAirCleaningMethod(clusterIonMethod)
DataPoint.Doc: A bitmap indicates mounted cluster ion method of exercising air cleaning function.

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAirPurificationLevel(electricalDustCollectionBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify the degree of the electrical dust collection-based air purification.

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAirPurifierFunction(electricalDustCollectionBased)

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(electricalDustCollectionBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the electrical dust collection-based air purification.

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAirPurificationLevel(clusterIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify the degree of the cluster ion-based air purification.

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAirPurifierFunction(clusterIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the cluster ion-based air purifier function.

DataPoint.name: airPurifierFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(clusterIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the cluster ion-based air purification.

DataPoint.name: mountedAirRefreshMethod(minusIonMethod)
DataPoint.Doc: A bitmap indicates mounted minus ion method for exercising refresh function.

DataPoint.name: mountedAirRefreshMethod(clusterIonMethod)

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAirRefreshingLevel(minusIonBased)

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAirRefresherFunction(minusIonBased)

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(minusIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the minus ion-based air refreshing.

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAirRefreshingLevel(clusterIonBased)

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAirRefresherFunction(clusterIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the cluster ion-based air refresher function.

DataPoint.name: airRefresherFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(clusterIonBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the cluster ion-based air refreshing.

DataPoint.name: mountedSelfCleaningMethod(ozoneCleaningMethod)

DataPoint.name: mountedSelfCleaningMethod(dryingMethod)

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingSelfCleaningLevel(ozoneBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify the degree of the ozone-based self-cleaning.

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingSelfCleaningFunction(ozoneBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the ozone-based self-cleaning function.

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(ozoneBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the ozone-based self-cleaning.

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingSelfCleaningLevel(dryingBased)

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingSelfCleaningFunction(dryingBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the drying-based self-cleaning function.

DataPoint.name: selfCleaningFunctionSettingAutomaticallyControlFunction(dryingBased)
DataPoint.Doc: This property used to specify whether or not to use the function to automatically control the degree of the drying-based self-cleaning.

DataPoint.name: specialFunctionSetting

DataPoint.name: airPurificationModeSetting

DataPoint.name: offTimerSetting(time)
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the time for the time-based reservation function in the HH:MM format and to acquire the current setting.

DataPoint.name: offTimerSetting(relativeTime)

DataPoint.name: automaticWaterHeatingSetting

DataPoint.name: automaticWaterTemperatureControlSetting

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeChargingElectricEnergy

DataPoint.name: systemInterconnectedType

DataPoint.name: maximumChargingPower(independent)

DataPoint.name: maximumDischargingPower(independent)

DataPoint.name: minimumChargingCurrent(independent)

DataPoint.name: maximumChargingCurrent(independent)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the maximum value of a charging current to the battery in the independent status in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: minimumDischargingCurrent(independent)

DataPoint.name: maximumDischargingCurrent(independent)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the maximum value of a discharging current in the independent status in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: charging/DischargingAmountSetting1
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the charging/discharging electric energy in Wh (positive/negative).

DataPoint.name: charging/DischargingAmountSetting2
DataPoint.Doc: Used to specify the charging/discharging capacity in units of 0.1Ah (positive/negative).

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricity1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining stored electric energy in Wh.

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricity2

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricity3
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the charging rate of the battery in %.

DataPoint.name: batteryStateOfHealth
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the battery state of health in %.

DataPoint.name: batteryType
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the battery type.

DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the charging electric energy in Wh.

DataPoint.name: dischargingAmountSetting1

DataPoint.name: chargingAmountSetting2
DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the charging capacity in units of 0.1Ah.

DataPoint.name: dischargingAmountSetting2

DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the charging electric energy in watts.

DataPoint.name: dischargingElectricEnergySetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the discharging electric energy in watts.

DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the charging current in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: dischargingCurrentSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property specifies the discharging current in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: ratedVoltage(independent)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the rated voltage of a battery in the independent status in volts.

Action.name: cumulativeAmountOfDischargingElectricEnergyResetSetting

Action.name: cumulativeAmountOfChargingElectricEnergyResetSetting
Action.Doc: This property resets the cumulative amount of charging electricity energy.

DataPoint.name: dischargeableCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery2

DataPoint.name: remainingDischargeableCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining dischargeable capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in Wh.

DataPoint.name: remainingDischargeableCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery2
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining dischargeable capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in units of 0.1Ah.

DataPoint.name: remainingDischargeableCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery3
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining dischargeable capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in %.

DataPoint.name: ratedChargeCapacity
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the rated charge capacity of an electric vehicle charger/discharger in W.

DataPoint.name: ratedDischargeCapacity

DataPoint.name: vehicleConnectionAndChargeable/DischargeableStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether an electric vehicle charger/discharger can be charged or discharged.

DataPoint.name: minimumChargingElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the minimum values of charging electric energy to an electric vehicle charger/discharger in W.

DataPoint.name: maximumChargingElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the maximum values of charging electric energy to an electric vehicle charger/discharger in W.

DataPoint.name: minimumDischargingElectricEnergy

DataPoint.name: maximumDischargingElectricEnergy

DataPoint.name: minimumChargingCurrent

DataPoint.name: maximumChargingCurrent
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the maximum values of charging electric energy to an electric vehicle charger/discharger in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: minimumDischargingCurrent
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the minimum values of discharging electric energy from an electric vehicle charger/discharger in units of 0.1A.

DataPoint.name: maximumDischargingCurrent

DataPoint.name: usedCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in Wh.

DataPoint.name: usedCapacityOfVehicleMountedBattery2
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in units of 0.1Ah.

DataPoint.name: ratedVoltage
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the normal rated voltage of an electric vehicle charger/discharger in V.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCharging/DischargingElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charging/discharging electric energy in ±W.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCharging/DischargingCurrent
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the instantaneous charging/discharging current in units of ±0.1A.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCharging/DischargingVoltage
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the instantaneous charging/discharging voltage in ±V.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfDischargingElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative amount of discharging electric energy in units of 0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfChargingElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative amount of charging electric energy in units of 0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: operationModeSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property sets the operation mode (Rapid charging /Charging /Discharging /Standby /Test /Other).

DataPoint.name: systemInterconnectedType
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the system interconnection status of an electric vehicle charger/discharger.

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricityOfVehicleMountedBattery1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the remaining stored capacity of an electric vehicle mounted battery connected to a charger/discharger in Wh.

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricityOfVehicleMountedBattery2

DataPoint.name: remainingStoredElectricityOfVehicleMountedBattery3

DataPoint.name: chargingAmountSetting1

DataPoint.name: chargingAmountSetting2

DataPoint.name: dischargingElectricEnergySetting

DeviceInfo.Name: low voltage smart electric energy meter

DataPoint.name: coefficient
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the coefficient for converting measured cumulative amount of electric energy and historical data to actual usage amount using a 6-digit decimal notation.

DataPoint.name: numberOfEffectiveDigitsForCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of effective digits for measured cumulative amounts of electric energy.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfElectricEnergy(normalDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

DataPoint.name: unitForCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy(normalAndReverseDirections)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) used for the measured cumulative amount of electric energy and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy1(normalDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved 1 and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (normal direction), which consists of 48 items of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours (00:00 to 23:30) of the day by time series from the highest-order byte.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy(reverseDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amounts of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy1(reverseDirection)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved 1 and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (reverse direction), which consists of 48 items of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours (00:00 to 23:30) of the day by time series from the highest-order byte.

DataPoint.name: dayForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyIsToBeRetrieved1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (which consists of 48 items of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours) is to be retrieved.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous electric energy in 1W unit.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCurrents(RPhase)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous R phase currents in 0.1A unit.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousCurrents(TPhase)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous T phase currents in 0.1A unit. In the case of a single-phase, two-wire system, 0x7FFE shall be used for the T phase.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasuredAtFixedTime(normalDirection)DateTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates date for the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (normal direction) measurement at 30-minute intervals held by the meter in the format of 4 bytes for date of measurement and 3 bytes for time of measurement. date of measurement YYYY:MM:DD time of measurement hh:mm:ss

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasuredAtFixedTime(normalDirection)ElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (normal direction) measured at 30-minute intervals held by the meter in the format of 4 bytes for cumulative electric energy (normal direction). cumulative electric energy: an 8-digit decimal notation number

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasuredAtFixedTime(reverseDirection)DateTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates date for the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (reverse direction) measurement at 30-minute intervals held by the meter in the format of 4 bytes for date of measurement and 3 bytes for time of measurement. date of measurement YYYY:MM:DD time of measurement hh:mm:ss

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyMeasuredAtFixedTime(reverseDirection)ElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (reverse direction) measured at 30-minute intervals held by the meter in the format of 4 bytes for cumulative electric energy (reverse direction). cumulative electric energy: an 8-digit decimal notation number

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy2(normalDirections)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy every 30 minutes in the normal directions within the past six hours in the form of cumulative amount of electric energy (8 digits max).

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergy2(reverseDirections)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy every 30 minutes in the reverse directions within the past six hours in the form of cumulative amount of electric energy (8 digits max).

DataPoint.name: dayForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyIsToBeRetrieved2DateTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the date and time of historical data of measurements (every 30 minutes) .

DataPoint.name: dayForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyIsToBeRetrieved2Segment
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of segments where measurement historical data is collected every 30 minutes.

DeviceInfo.Name: High voltage smart electric energy meter

DataPoint.name: coefficient
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the coefficient for converting meter readings to actual kWh, kVarh and kW usage in 6-digit decimal notation.

DataPoint.name: multiplyingFactorForCoefficient
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the multiplying factor for coefficient.

DataPoint.name: fixedDate
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the fixed date for monthly usage, etc.

DataPoint.name: dayForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountsOfElectricEnergyIsToBeRetrieved
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved (consisting of 48 items of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours) is to be retrieved.

DataPoint.name: measurementDateTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measurement date and time of active electric energy or electric power. Indicates the measurement date in 4 bytes and measurement time in 3 bytes. Measurement date YYYY:MM:DD Measurement time hh:mm:ss

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeAmountOfActiveElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of active electric energy at the most recent measurement time using a maximum of 8 digits in decimal notation. Indicates the cumulative amount of active electric energy in 4 bytes. Cumulative amount of active electric energy Max. 8 digits in decimal notation

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountsOfActiveElectricEnergyAtFixedTime
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the most recent cumulative amount of active electric energy measured at 30-minute intervals held by the meter with the cumulative amount of active electric energy in 4 bytes. cumulative electric energy: an 8-digit decimal notation number

DataPoint.name: measurementDataOfCumulativeAmountOfActiveElectricEnergyForPowerFactorMeasurement
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measurement data of cumulative amount of active electric energy for power factor measurement at the most recent measurement time, with the cumulative amount of active electric energy in 4 bytes. Cumulative amount of active electric energy Max. 8 digits in decimal notation

DataPoint.name: numberOfEffectiveDigitsForCumulativeAmountOfActiveElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of effective digits for cumulative amounts of active electric energy.

DataPoint.name: unitForCumulativeAmountsOfActiveElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit for measured cumulative active electric energy and historical data (multiplying factors).

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeAmountOfActiveElectricEnergy
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the historical data of measured cumulative amount of active electric energy on the retrieval day specified under “day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved”, equaling 48 pieces of half-hourly data for 24 hours (00:00-23:30) of the day by time series from the highest-order byte.

DataPoint.name: monthlyMaximumElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the maximum value of meter readings for electric power demand recorded between the date of the last fixed reading and the most recent measurement time.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeMaximumElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative value of meter readings for maximum electric power demand contractually fixed by the electric power company.

DataPoint.name: electricPowerDemandAtFixedTime(30MinuteAverageElectricPower)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the meter reading for electric power demand (30-minute average electric power) in the most recent half-hourly measurement time, with the electric power demand (30-minute average electric power) in 4 bytes. Electric power demand Max. 8 digits in decimal notation

DataPoint.name: numberOfEffectiveDigitsOfElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of effective digits of electric power demand.

DataPoint.name: unitOfElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit for the monthly maximum electric power demand, and the electric power demand at fixed time (30-minute average electric power).

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates historical data of meter readings for electric power demand at fixed time (30-minute average electric power) on the day specified under “Day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved”, equaling 48 pieces of half-hourly data for 24 hours (00:00-23:30) of the day by time series from the highest-order byte.

DataPoint.name: unitOfCumulativeMaximumElectricPowerDemand
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit of cumulative maximum electric power demand.

DataPoint.name: measurementDataOfReactiveElectricPowerConsumption(lag)ForPowerFactorMeasurement
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measurement data of reactive electric power consumption (lag) for power factor measurement at the most recent measurement time, with the cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption in 4 bytes. Cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption (lag) Max. 8 digits in decimal notation

DataPoint.name: measurementDataOfCumulativeAmountOfReactiveElectricPowerConsumption(lag)AtFixedTimeForPowerFactorMeasurement
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measurement data of cumulative amount of reactive electric power for power factor measurement at the most recent half-hourly measurement time, with the cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption in 4 bytes. Cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption (lag) Max.8 digits in decimal notation

DataPoint.name: numberOfEffectiveDigitsForMeasurementDataOfCumulativeAmountOfReactiveElectricPowerConsumption(lag)ForPowerFactorMeasurement
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the number of effective digits of measured data of cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption(lag) for power factor measurement.

DataPoint.name: unitOfMeasurementDataOfCumulativeAmountOfReactiveElectricPowerConsumption(lag)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) for measurement data of cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption (lag) and historical data.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasurementDataOfCumulativeAmountOfReactiveElectricPowerConsumption(lag)ForPowerFactorMeasurement
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates historical data for cumulative amount of reactive electric power consumption (lag) measurements at fixed time on the day specified under “Day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved”, equaling 48 pieces of half-hourly data for 24 hours (00:00-23:30) of the day by time series from the highest-order byte.

Action.name: gasLeakOccurrenceStatusResetting
Action.Doc: Resets gas leak occurrence status by setting 0x00.

DataPoint.name: detectionThresholdLevel
DataPoint.Doc: Specifies detection threshold level in 8 steps.

DataPoint.name: gasLeakOccurrenceStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates gas leak occurrence status.

DataPoint.name: detectionThresholdLevel
DataPoint.Doc: Specifies detection threshold level (8-step).

DataPoint.name: gasDetectionStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates gas detection status.

DataPoint.name: measuredValueOfGasConcentration
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates measured value of gas concentration in ppm.

Action.name: cumulativePowerGenerationOutputResetSetting
Action.Doc: Resets the cumulative power generation output by writing 0x00.

Action.name: cumulativeGasConsumptionResetSetting
Action.Doc: Resets the cumulative gas consumption by writing 0x00.

Action.name: inHouseCumulativePowerConsumptionReset
Action.Doc: This property is set to 0x00 to reset the in-house cumulative power consumption.

DataPoint.name: measuredTemperatureOfWaterInWaterHeater
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the current temperature of the water in the water heater in °C.

DataPoint.name: ratedPowerGenerationOutput
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the rated power generation output in watts.

DataPoint.name: heatingValueOfHotWaterStorageTank
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the heating value of the hot water storage tank in MJ.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousPowerGenerationOutput
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the instantaneous power generation output in watts.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativePowerGenerationOutput
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative power generation output in increments of 0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: measuredInstantaneousGasConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the instantaneous gas consumption in increments of 0.001m^3/h.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeGasConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the cumulative gas consumption in increments of 0.001m^3.

DataPoint.name: powerGenerationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the setting of start or stop of power generation.

DataPoint.name: powerGenerationStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates power generation status.

DataPoint.name: measuredInHouseInstantaneousPowerConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured in-house instantaneous power consumption in watts.

DataPoint.name: measuredInHouseCumulativePowerConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured in-house cumulative power consumption in0.001kWh.

DataPoint.name: systemInterconnectedType
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the system interconnected type.

DataPoint.name: measuredRemainingHotWaterAmount
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured amount of the remaining hot water in liters.

DataPoint.name: tankCapacity
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the tank capacity in liters.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountOfGasConsumptionMeasurementValue
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption in units of 0.001 m^3.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountOfGasConsumptionMeasurementLog
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption measurement result log for past 24 hours as data in 30-minute segments.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountOfGasConsumptionOfMeteringData1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption in units of 0.0001 m^3.

DataPoint.name: cumulativeAmountOfGasConsumptionOfMeteringData2
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption in units of 0.001 m^3.

DataPoint.name: errorDetectionStatusOfMeteringData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates status where meter detected metering data error.

DataPoint.name: securityData1
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates security data to define security information on meter operation by bit allocation.

DataPoint.name: securityData2
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates security data to define security information on meter operation by bit allocation.

DataPoint.name: centerValveShutOffStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off by center.

DataPoint.name: centerValveShutOffRecoveryPermissionSettingStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off by center.

DataPoint.name: emergencyValveShutOffStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates status where gas shut-off valve of meter has been shut off.

DataPoint.name: shutOffValveOpen/CloseStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates open/close status of shut-off valve.

DataPoint.name: residualVolumeControlWarning
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates status as warning where residual volume is very small.

DataPoint.name: setValueOfResidualVolumeControlWarningLevel1
DataPoint.Doc: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 1”.

DataPoint.name: setValueOfResidualVolumeControlWarningLevel2
DataPoint.Doc: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 2”.

DataPoint.name: setValueOfResidualVolumeControlWarningLevel1
DataPoint.Doc: Sets “Small residual volume detection level 3”.

DataPoint.name: slightLeakTimerValue(gasFlowRateContinuation)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates number of days on which gas flow rate is continued.

DataPoint.name: slightLeakTimerValue(withoutPressureIncrease)
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates number of days on which gas leak monitoring is performed without gas pressure increase.

DataPoint.name: shutOffReasonLog
DataPoint.Doc: Defines log of reasons for gas shut-off by shut-off valve in 1 byte each with bits assigned. Shows the last three logs. Log 3: log 2: log 1

DataPoint.name: maximumValueOfSupplyPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates maximum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: minimumValueOfSupplyPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: currentValueOfSupplyPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates current value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: maximumValueOfBlockPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: minimumValueOfBlockPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates minimum value of supply pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: currentValueOfBlockPressureData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates current value of block pressure data in units of 0.01 kPa.

DataPoint.name: numberOfBlockPressureErrorDays
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates number of days on which block pressure errors occurred in 1 byte.

DataPoint.name: numberOfBlockPressureErrorTimes
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates times on which block pressure errors occurred in 1 byte.

DataPoint.name: numberOfBlockSupplyErrorDays
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates number of days on which supply pressure errors occurred in 1 byte.

DataPoint.name: numberOfBlockSupplyErrorTimes
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates times on which block supply errors occurred in 1 byte.

DataPoint.name: testCallSetting
DataPoint.Doc: Performs test call operation setup.

DataPoint.name: gasMeterClassificationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the type of the gas meter.

DataPoint.name: ownerClassificationSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the type of owner of the meter.

DataPoint.name: measuredCumulativeGasConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the measured cumulative gas consumption in m^3.

DataPoint.name: unitForMeasuredCumulativeGasConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) for the measured cumulative gas consumption and the historical data of measured cumulative gas consumption.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeGasConsumption
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative gas consumption is to be retrieved and the historical data of measured cumulative gas consumption, which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

DataPoint.name: daySettingForWhichTheHistoricalDataOfMeasuredCumulativeGasConsumptionIsToBeRetrieved
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative gas consumption (which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours) is to be retrieved.

DataPoint.name: detectionOfAbnormalValueInMeteringData
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the meter has detected an abnormal value in the metering data.

DataPoint.name: securityDataInformation
DataPoint.Doc: Provides security information about the abnormal states detected by the meter in the form of security data that identifies the abnormal states by means of bit assignment.

DataPoint.name: valveClosureByTheCenter
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the Center has closed the gas shutoff valve of the meter.

DataPoint.name: permissionFromTheCenterToReopenTheValveClosedByTheCenter
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether permission has been given by the Center to reopen the gas shutoff valve of the meter closed by the Center.

DataPoint.name: emergencyClosureOfShutoffValve
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the gas shutoff valve of the meter has been closed in response to an emergency.

DataPoint.name: shutoffValveStatus
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates whether the shutoff valve is open or closed.

DataPoint.name: historicalDataOfShutoffReasons
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the reasons for the 3 past shutoff valve-based gas shutoffs by means of bit assignment with one byte used for each of the 3 shutoff reasons. Historical data3: Historical data2: Historical data 1

DataPoint.name: idNumberSetting
DataPoint.Doc: This property indicates the ID number of the meter.

DataPoint.name: verificationExpirationSetting
